Description: The death of the first born in Egypt, study for a picture; woman to left holding arm of her dead child, in centre other figures mourning over dead children, man stands erect in centre Pen and grey ink with grey wash Verso; study for the same subject; four figures sit around dead figure in centre Pen and grey ink with grey wash
Bibliographic references: Binyon 1898-1907 / Catalogue of drawings by British artists, and artists of foreign origin working in Great Britain (3)
